title: Greeting
sentence1: Welcome! This is a beta version Bitcoin-based dApp.

title: Project
sentence1: Please connect🔌 to Bitcoin blockchain🔗 with a web3 wallet extension (i.e., unisat).
sentence2: Welcome to support and tip this project (buy us a coffee☕️ or meal🍱) [tip us via testnet also welcome].
sentence3: Simply press the connect button in the top-right↗️ corner and kick start your wonderful journey with Bitcoin.
author: ψ
